thread.title: Zelensky: Ukrainian treaty takes our relations with partners to a new level | УНН
thread.title_full: Zelensky: Ukrainian treaty takes our relations with partners to a new level | УНН

author: Julia Kotvitskaya
title: Zelensky: Ukrainian treaty takes our relations with partners to a new level | УНН
text: Zelensky: Ukrainian treaty takes our relations with partners to a new level Kyiv • UNN 21 countries and the European Union signed the Ukraine Treaty at the NATO summit. Zelenskyy said that the treaty takes relations with partners to a new level. According to the president, this is a significant achievement. This Ukrainian treaty that we are forming takes our relations to a new level. This is a significant achievement for Ukraine and all of us. This was reported by President of Ukraine Volodymyr Zelenskyy, UNN reports. Details President of Ukraine Volodymyr Zelenskyy has claimed a significant step toward strengthening Ukraine's security following the adoption of the G7 declaration at the NATO summit in Vilnius last year. We didn't waste any time, and now we have a reliable security architecture He also expressed gratitude to U.S. President Joe Biden for his leadership and all efforts to strengthen security cooperation with Ukraine. We have 23 strong agreements, and there will be more agreements with other countries In addition, the Head of State commented on the signing of the Ukrainian Treaty. This Ukrainian treaty that we are forming takes our relations to a new level. This is a significant achievement for Ukraine and for all of us [At the NATO Summit, 21 countries and the EU signed the Ukraine TreatyJuly 11 2024, 10:36 PM • 11848 views](/en/news/at-the-nato-summit-21-countries-and-the-eu-signed-the-ukraine-treaty) [Exclusive](/en/news/mayor-the-communitys-desire-to-keep-the-historical-name-brovary-is-supported-by-the-conclusions-of-respected-scientific-institutions) Mayor: The community's desire to keep the historical name "Brovary" is supported by the conclusions of respected scientific institutions [Exclusive](/en/news/ukraine-should-identify-rf-related-businesses-abroad-and-stop-aggressors-attempts-to-influence-international-politics-expert) Ukraine should identify businesses connected with the Russian Federation abroad and stop the aggressor's attempts to influence international politics -
